scripts.transpile: tsc src/app.ts && tsc src/app/config/db.config.ts && tsc src/app/models/index.ts && tsc src/app/models/bookmodel.ts && tsc src/app/routes/books.route.ts && tsc src/app/controllers/books.controller.ts && tsc src/app/services/book.service.ts && tsc src/app/services/db.service.ts
scripts.start: npm run transpile && node src/app.js local
